text: The Loves of Carmen is a 1948 American romantic adventure drama movie directed by Charles Vidor and is based on the 1845 novella Carmen by Prosper Mérimée. It stars Rita Hayworth, Glenn Ford, Ron Randell, Victor Jory, Luther Adler, Arnold Moss, Joseph Buloff and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1949 and is the remake of the 1927 movie of the same name. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1948 romantic drama movies Category:1948 adventure movies Category:1940s American adventure movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Charles Vidor Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The Loves of Carmen (1948 movie)
